author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- added sumGluonsWithSameChildren option to better compact gluons
- added fillDescriptions
- minor code improvements

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Ran on workflow 1302.181 (Pythia 8 TTbar) substituting the storage of the full GenParticles container with one using 
```
process.genParticles = cms.EDProducer("GenParticlePruner",
                                      src = cms.InputTag("fullGenParticles"),
                                      sumGluonsWithSameChildren = cms.bool(True),
                                      select = cms.vstring("keep *",
                                                           "drop  status > 30 && status < 70"
                                      ))
```

This ran fine and generated a GenParticle list which was 58% the size of the full list to store on the file which resulted in an over all AOD file being 10% smaller.
title: Extend GenParticlePruner
